channel.title: Let's post luls regarding the update tomorrow
channel.description:
As topic says...
ex: Jagex mods banning players who try to discuss how the update may not work, etc, etc.
Use http://anonym.to/ please.
http://anonym.to/?http://services.runescape.com/m=forum/forums.ws?16,17,59,63291430

item.title: Let's post luls regarding the update tomorrow
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“tinyscape, post:16, topic:419399”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=521947.msg3793847#msg3793847 date=1319490194]

No, because their all british. Besides, runescape is probably one of the least popular (not like oh im cool popular, like less players) games out there. Bungie, InfinityWard, Invision, Blizzard all get many more players then runescape simply because their games are better. I guess what i said didn’t come out how i meant it.

No, because their all british.[/quote][quote author=Exstasy link=topic=521947.msg3793833#msg3793833 date=1319489204]
all british

[/quote]

[quote author=tinyscape link=topic=521957.msg3793955#msg3793955 date=1319496382]
Proud to be British.
[/quote]Problem?[/quote]
Huge problem :o

They make the Halos and I less than 3 the Halos.

Read full topic

item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Exstasy, post:8, topic:419399”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=521947.msg3793818#msg3793818 date=1319488709]

You’d have something far up your ass too if you had to deal with kid’s and adult’s that act like kid’s 24/7.

Anybody who works for Jagex is an underpaid 40 year old virgin. All of them have something far up their ass.
[/quote]Why? Because they work for a gaming industry trying to succeed? Much like Invision, Bungie, and Blizzard? So none of their employees have lost their virginity? Good one.

and lul

No, because their all british. Besides, runescape is probably one of the least popular (not like oh im cool popular, like less players) games out there. Bungie, InfinityWard, Invision, Blizzard all get many more players then runescape simply because their games are better. I guess what i said didn’t come out how i meant it.[/quote]
Bungie =/= British
